en-us.bullet_points: • Pretend-play for animal-lovers – This Guinea Pig Playground toy for girls, boys and animal fans aged 5 years old and up comes with 2 minidolls, 2 guinea pig figures and accessories for role play• Playground with slide and merry-go-round – Playtimes are packed with fun as the guinea pigs ride down the slide and spin on the merry-go-round before visiting the feeding and grooming areas• 2 minidolls and 2 guinea pig figures – There is lots of opportunity for creativity with this social-emotional toy as kids tell the story of Aliya and Matilde, who bond over their love of guinea pigs• Animal toy accessories – This LEGO® set comes with a brush, sunflower seeds, leaves and a yarn ball accessory, making it a fun set for kids who enjoy caring for pets• A guinea pig gift for kids – This guinea pig playset makes a fun gift for kids who love animals and creative storytelling• Online show – Inspire more creative-play ideas with other sets (sold separately) and the LEGO® Friends: The Next Chapter online show, where kids can get to know the characters of Heartlake City• Measurements – 86-piece set with a main model measuring over 3.5 in. (8 cm) high, 4.5 in. (12 cm) wide and 3.5 in. (9 cm) deep
en-us.comm_bullet_points: • Pretend-play for animal-lovers – This Guinea Pig Playground toy for girls, boys and animal fans aged 5 years old and up comes with 2 minidolls, 2 guinea pig figures and accessories for role play• Playground with slide and merry-go-round – Playtimes are packed with fun as the guinea pigs ride down the slide and spin on the merry-go-round before visiting the feeding and grooming areas• 2 minidolls and 2 guinea pig figures – There is lots of opportunity for creativity with this social-emotional toy as kids tell the story of Aliya and Matilde, who bond over their love of guinea pigs• Animal toy accessories – This LEGO® set comes with a brush, sunflower seeds, leaves and a yarn ball accessory, making it a fun set for kids who enjoy caring for pets• A guinea pig gift for kids – This guinea pig playset makes a fun gift for kids who love animals and creative storytelling
en-us.comm_description:
Here’s a pretend-play building kit for girls, boys and animal-lovers aged 5 and up who would love to create their own guinea pig adventures. The LEGO® Friends Guinea Pig Playground (42640) comes with 2 LEGO Friends mini-dolls and 2 guinea pig figures for hours of role-play fun.
This animal playset comes with everything a responsible pet owner needs, with areas for play, feeding, grooming and nap time. Take the guinea pigs for a ride down the slide or spin them on the merry-go-round. Then, when it’s time for a rest, help the pets settle into the sleeping area. The set comes with accessories, including a brush, sunflower seeds, leaves and a yarn ball, and makes a fun gift for the little animal-lover in your life.
Discover more pretend-playbuilding sets (sold separately) in the LEGO Friends universe. This set comes with the LEGO Builder app for intuitive building. Here kids can zoom in and rotate models in 3D, save sets and track progress as they build.
en-us.description: Guinea pig playtimes are the best! Can you help Aliya and Matilde care for their pets Ruby and Lucky at the Guinea Pig Playground? Take them for a ride on the slide. Then let them spin on the merry-go-round. Feed and brush the guinea pigs before they head into their little house for a nap. Is there anything sweeter than a sleeping guinea pig?
features: A pretend-play building kit for animal-lovers
The LEGO® Friends Guinea Pig Playground set comes with 2 minidolls and 2 guinea pig figures for imaginative play.
Building imagination through play
Kids aged 5 and up have lots of fun developing their building skills before playing with the characters and the guinea pigs.
LEGO® Friends Guinea Pig Playground
Let’s play!
Take the guinea pigs for a ride on the slide.
Care for the pets
Give the guinea pigs a snack or let them take a nap.
Lots of fun!
Theguinea pigs love to be groomed on the merry-go-round.
Enter a digital world of building
Builders can zoom in, rotate sets in 3D and track progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO® Builder app.
A guinea pig gift with lots to discover
This set includes a buildable playground, 2 minidolls, 2 guinea pig figures and lots of accessories for role-play fun.
en-us.headline: A LEGO® building set to inspire imaginative play
en-us.one_liner: A guinea pig gift LEGO® Friends toy set with 2 mini-dolls and 2 guinea pig figures to inspire imaginative play for kids who love caring for pets.
en-us.title: Guinea Pig Playground

locale.en-us.description: Guinea pig playtimes are the best!
locale.en-us.title: Guinea Pig Playground

en-us.bullet_points: • Put Minecraft™ adventures into kids’ hands with LEGO® BigFig Pig and Baby Zombie. These authentic real-world models of the iconic video game characters are great to play with, to display and to collect.• Big and easy to build, LEGO® brick BigFig Pig and Baby Zombie toys feature a realistic design with movable limbs to maximize play possibilities. And when the action stops, they look great as decorations in kids’ rooms.• Give kids new ways to play Minecraft™. Whether kids are recreating favorite Minecraft scenes or making up adventures of their own, LEGO® BigFigs add a whole new physical dimension to the popular computer game.• Great gift for Minecraft™ players! Cool Christmas, birthday or any-other-day present for boys and girls aged 7 and up. Only requires basic building skills and combines with other LEGO® Minecraft BigFig sets.• At over 4” (10cm) long and 2” (6cm) high, the BigFig Pig offers Minecraft™ fun on a large scale – whether having adventures with Baby Zombie at over 2” (7cm) tall or with other BigFigs from the LEGO® Minecraft collection.• Battery-free fun, so the enjoyment never ends! Real-world, hands-on play powered by kids’ imaginations gets them off the PC and boosts their thinking, problem-solving and social skills.• Get kids building and playing with their toys quickly! Simple, clear instructions ensure the fun starts straight out of the box.• Every LEGO® Minecraft™ BigFig toy brings Minecraft’s online excitement into the real world. With high-quality, authentic-looking models, LEGO Minecraft sets take kids’ play experience into a new dimension!• Because LEGO® toys meet the highest industry standards as well as our own quality criteria, they are consistent, compatible and connect and pull apart perfectly every time – and it’s been that way since 1958.• At The LEGO Group, we drop, squash, twist, heat, bend, scratch and stretch LEGO® bricks and pieces to ensure they meet the highest global safety and quality standards – and you can be certain your child is safe.
en-us.comm_bullet_points: • Put Minecraft™ adventures into kids’ hands with LEGO® BigFig Pig and Baby Zombie. These authentic real-world models of the iconic video game characters are great to play with, to display and to collect.• Big and easy to build, LEGO® brick BigFig Pig and Baby Zombie toys feature a realistic design with movable limbs to maximize play possibilities. And when the action stops, they look great as decorations in kids’ rooms.• Give kids new ways to play Minecraft™. Whether kids are recreating favorite Minecraft scenes or making up adventures of their own, LEGO® BigFigs add a whole new physical dimension to the popular computer game.• Great gift for Minecraft™ players! Cool Christmas, birthday or any-other-day present for boys and girls aged 7 and up. Only requires basic building skills and combines with other LEGO® Minecraft BigFig sets.• At over 4” (10cm) long and 2” (6cm) high, the BigFig Pig offers Minecraft™ fun on a large scale – whether having adventures with Baby Zombie at over 2” (7cm) tall or with other BigFigs from the LEGO® Minecraft collection.
en-us.comm_description: Minecraft™ players can bring the game’s online excitement to life with a LEGO® Minecraft BigFig Pig and Baby Zombie. This large-scale set inspires endless independent play and provides cool Minecraft decorations that kids will love to display in their rooms!Give kids the 3D Minecraft toy experience!Children aged 7 and up will love to continue their Minecraft adventures in the real world. Pig and Baby Zombie are buildable, posable toys designed to give kids hands-on Minecraft fun wherever they are. The lovable, pink Pig’s head and legs are movable, and so are the cute, green-faced Baby Zombie’s head, legs and arms. Pig is even happy to let Baby Zombie ride on its back!Make Minecraft Mega – with LEGO® BigFig sets!LEGO® Minecraft BigFig sets are supercool, super- collectible and, best of all for adults, a super Christmas or birthday gift for kids. BigFigs are extra-large for extra enjoyment, and they put hands-on, open-ended creative play in Minecraft players’ hands!
en-us.description: Bring the coolest computer game to life with this Minecraft™ BigFig Pig and Baby Zombie! The tiny terror is fast and dangerous – and when he’s riding a Pig, anything can happen! Position and pose the Pig’s head and legs, move Baby Zombie’s head, legs and arms… and when the action’s over, they’ll look awesome in your room alongside other characters from the LEGO® Minecraft BigFig collection.
features: Minecraft™ Pig BigFig with Baby Zombie
Large-scale, buildable Minecraft™ Pig BigFig with Baby Zombie – perfect for play and display.
Bring online gaming into the real world
Give Minecraft™ players a new way to build their favorite game with this movable Pig BigFig and Baby Zombie.
Posable Pig
Movable head and legs increase the display possibilities.
Real-world gaming fun
Kids build and role-play their own Minecraft™ stories.
Movable Baby Zombie
Adjust the tiny terror’s head, legs and arms.
Quickfor kids to assemble
Easy-build toys with clear instructions to get the imaginative adventures started straightaway.
Includes a Pig BigFig and Baby Zombie
Collect and combine with other LEGO® Minecraft™ BigFigs for even more play-and-display possibilities.

en-us.one_liner: Kids who love Minecraft™ will adore this BigFig Pig and Baby Zombie. Easy to build and with posable parts, they’re great for play and room decoration!

en-us.bullet_points:
• Includes 5 minifigures: a dancer in pig costume and 4 dragon dancers.
• Features a colorful buildable dragon with an opening mouth, posable tail and dancing function, plus a rotating dragon ball on a stick.
• Turn the handle to make the dragon and dragon dancers dance and the dragon ball rotate.
• The dragon dancer minifigures are new for January 2019.
• Add even more LEGO® fun to your Chinese New Year celebrations with the LEGO® 80101 Chinese New Year's Eve Dinner playset.
• Measures over 6” (17cm) high, 12” (33cm) wide and 2” (6cm) deep.
en-us.comm_bullet_points:
• Build a traditional play-and-display model featuring a buildable dragon with an opening mouth and posable tail, then turn the handle to make the dragon and dragon dancers dance and dragon ball rotate!
• Includes 5 minifigures: a dancer in pig costume holding the dragon ball and 4 dragon dancers
• Measures over 6” (17cm) high, 12” (33cm) wide and 2” (6cm) deep
• 622 pieces – For boys and girls aged 9+ and for fans and big kids of all ages
• This LEGO Dragon Dance 80102 playset can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for creative building
en-us.comm_description: Celebrate the Year of the Pig with this beautifully detailed LEGO 80102 Dragon Dance model, featuring a buildable dragon with an opening mouth, posable tail and dancing function, plus a dragon ball on a stick with a rotating function. Turn the handle to make the dragon and dragon dancers dance and the dragon ball spin. This colorful construction toy for play and display includes 5 dragon dancer minifigures, including the lead dancer in pig costume holding the dragon ball.
en-us.description: Dance for good fortune in the Year of the Pig! Open the mouth and pose the tail of the colorful dragon. Dress up as a pig and carry the dragon ball in front of the dragon and the dragon dancers. Then turn the handle to make the dragon and dragon dancers dance and the dragon ball spin!
en-us.headline: Recreate the Dragon Dance in LEGO® style for play and display!
en-us.title: Dragon Dance

locale.en-us.description: Dance for good fortune in the Year of the Pig!

en-us.bullet_points:
• Includes 4 figures: Red, Stella and 2 piggies.
• Pig City features a zip line, hot dog stand, small house and a falling boulder.
• Accessory elements include a catapult for the birds, umbrella, 5 eggs, 3 sticks of TNT, TNT storage box, 5 balloons, hot dog plus ketchup and mustard dispensers, and a ladder.
• Target zones include boulder and zip-lining pig, bridge, hot dog stand roof and TNT function.
• Aim the birds at the target zones to collapse the structures.
• Hit the boulder to activate the pig on the sliding umbrella zip line.
• Knock the lever above the boulder to make it land on the box of TNT, and use the sticks of dynamite against the pigs.
• Land a bird on to the roof of the hot dog stand to crash it.
• Target zones and collapsible structures are easy to reassemble for fast-action play.
• Create fun action scenes with a twist from The Angry BirdsTM  Movie.
• This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for children ages 7-14.
• Pig City measures over 8” (21cm)high, 9” (24cm) wide and 6” (16cm) deep.
• Catapult measures over 2” (6cm) high, 3” (8cm) long and 1” (4cm) wide.
en-us.description: Use the catapult to shoot Red and Stella into Pig City! Cause a chain reaction by firing the birds above the boulder, and use the piggies' own TNT against them! Chase the piggies all over Pig City to get the eggs back, but keep your eyes peeled for the sliding piggy in his umbrella! Will the birds even find their eggs in all this piggy-crashing excitement?
en-us.headline: Send the birds into Pig City and get the eggs back!
en-us.one_liner: Crash the piggy party! Catapult the birds into Pig City, including a box of TNT, hot dog stand and a zip-lining pig for really explosive fun! Includes 4 figures.
en-us.title: Pig City Teardown

locale.en-us.description: Use the catapult to shoot Red and Stella into Pig City!
locale.en-us.title: Pig City Teardown

en-us.bullet_points: • LEGO® Minecraft® toy with animals – The Baby Pig House for kids aged 7 and up is packed with hands-on fun for girls and boys with a passion for Minecraft, home-building, animals and farms• Minecraft® toy figures – Includes a hero character in a wolf skin, a baby pig, bee, an adult pig and a zombified piglin• LEGO® Minecraft® baby pig house – Kids build a pig-shaped house that comes with a farm plot where potatoes and beets grow, a field with a gate to guide the baby pig through and more• Authentic details – Inside the house, there’s a Minecraft® crafting table, a bed and a bookcase to inspire imaginative play• Minecraft® gift for kids – This LEGO® build-and-play toy is a birthday, holiday or any-day gift idea for girls and boys aged 7 and up• Expand the fun – Check out the full range of LEGO® Minecraft® toys (sold separately) for more hands-on gaming sets• Minecraft® made real – LEGO® Minecraft building toys for kids give players a different way to enjoy the game, with mobs, scenes and features brought to life with the hands-on creativity of LEGO bricks• 238-piece set – The completed playset measures over 3 in. (8 cm) high, 7.5 in. (19 cm) wide and 6 in. (16 cm) deep
en-us.comm_bullet_points: • LEGO® Minecraft® toy with animals – The Baby Pig House for kids aged 7 and up is packed with hands-on fun for girls and boys with a passion for Minecraft, home-building, animals and farms• Minecraft® toy figures – Includes a hero character in a wolf skin, a baby pig, bee, an adult pig and a zombified piglin• LEGO® Minecraft® baby pig house – Kids build a pig-shaped house that comes with a farm plot where potatoes and beets grow, a field with a gate to guide the baby pig through and more• Authentic details ¬– Inside the house, there’s a Minecraft® crafting table, a bed and a bookcase to inspire imaginative play• Minecraft® gift for kids – This LEGO® build-and-play toy is a birthday, holiday or any-day gift idea for girls and boys aged 7and up
en-us.comm_description:
The Baby Pig House (21268) is the ideal toy for Minecraft® players with a passion for home-building, animals and farms. This hands-on Minecraft toy for girls and boys makes a great birthday, holiday or any-day gaming gift for kids aged 7 and up.
Set in the Minecraft forest biome, this creative home-building toy includes many figures from the popular video game: a hero character in a wolf skin, a baby pig, bee, an adult pig and a zombified piglin. Kids can replicate action from the game, like saddling up the adult pig and dangling a carrot in front of it to take a ride around the pig-shaped house and garden. There’s a farm plot with potatoes and beets to grow, and a field with a gate to guide the baby pig through. Kids can avoid the zombified piglin, who wants to spoil the fun, by going inside the house, where there’s a bed, bookcase and a crafting table to inspire imaginative play. The LEGO® Builder app gives kids the added fun of using their device to zoom in and rotate models in 3D.
en-us.description: Put on your wolf skin, saddle up your pig, put a carrot on a stick and take a ride around your baby-pig-shaped house and garden. Check out the potatoes and beets growing in the plot, then guide the baby pig through the gate into the field. If the zombified piglin spoils your fun, head inside the house, where there’s a bed, bookcase and a crafting table where you can get creative.
features: Minecraft® fun on the pig-shaped farmstead
Home-building adventures for Minecraft® players, with animals to care for and crops to grow – and a zombie piglin to fend off!
Endless build-and-play possibilities
The creative LEGO® Minecraft® adventuresstart right away and continue as kids enjoy imaginative play of their own.
LEGO® Minecraft® The Baby Pig House
Grow food on the farm
Tend to the potatoes and beets growing in the farm plot.
Get creative in the pig house
Inside the house is a bed, bookc ase and a crafting table.
Care for the baby pig
Guide the baby pig through the gate into the field.
Enter a digital world of building
Builders can zoom in, rotate sets in 3D and track progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO® Builder app.
Kids build skills as they play
Players create and customize the LEGO® Minecraft® environment as they continually reshape their imaginative adventures.
en-us.headline: LEGO® Minecraft® farmstead, with animals, crops and a zombie
en-us.one_liner: LEGO® Minecraft® The Baby Pig House is filled with home-building fun, including animals to care for, crops to grow – and a zombie piglin to fend off!
en-us.title: The Baby Pig House

en-us.description: It's feeding time at the farm. The farmer has a lot of fun feeding the pig carrots and giving it water to drink. The dog jumps happily around the farmer, helping him watch the pig. Includes one minifigure and two farm animals.

locale.en-us.description: The dog jumps happily around the farmer, helping him watch the pig.

en-us.bullet_points: • Beach and boat toy fantasy playset – Toddlers aged 2+ set sail on a beach adventure with the LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig Boat Trip inspired by the TV show• Build-and-rebuild toy with 2 Peppa Pig figures – Comes with Peppa and Grandpa Pig figures, a buildable and floating toy boat, plus lots of creative accessories to spark limitless storytelling• Peppa Pig toy helps toddlers recreate joyful beach fun – Peppa applies sunscreen before building a sandcastle with her shovel, collecting shells in her bucket and swimming with her flippers• Floating toy for water fun – This Peppa Pig boat toy floats for real, so toddlers can enjoy water play with their favorite TV character• Gift idea for toddlers – Make a splash with toddlers who love Peppa Pig and water toys with this special occasion gift for preschool kids• Quality sets – LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig build-and-rebuild toys use bricks and elements that have been tested to the max to ensure they fulfill demanding child safety standards• Kids’ learning toy for preschoolers – LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig toys support fine motor skills and emotional development learning through fun-filled, creative playtimes• Measurements – This 23-piece set includes a boat toy that measures over 4.5 in. (11 cm) high, 4.5 in. (12 cm) long and 7 in. (18 cm) wide
en-us.comm_bullet_points: • Beach and boat toy fantasy playset – Toddlers aged 2+ set sail on a beach adventure with the LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig Boat Trip inspired by the TV show• Build-and-rebuild toy with 2 Peppa Pig figures – Comes with Peppa and Grandpa Pig figures, a buildable and floating toy boat, plus lots of creative accessories to spark limitless storytelling• Peppa Pig toy helps toddlers recreate joyful beach fun – Peppa applies sunscreen before building a sandcastle with her shovel, collecting shells in her bucket and swimming with her flippers• Floating toy for water fun – This Peppa Pig boat toy floats for real, so toddlers can enjoy water play with their favorite TV character• Gift idea for toddlers – Make a splash with toddlers who love Peppa Pig and water toys with this special occasion gift for preschool kids
en-us.comm_description:
All aboard the LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig Boat Trip Toy (10432) for hours of joyful preschool learning. Girls and boys aged 2+ join the Grandpa Pig and Peppa Pig figures as they head to the beach with his boat.
This build-and-rebuild toy is packed with creative accessories to give toddlers storytelling inspiration. They help Peppa apply sunscreen before hunting for shells and finesse their stacking skills building a sandcastle. If the sun’s too hot Peppa can shelter under the parasol, or go for a swim, and toddlers practice their hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills as they help her put on her flippers. If toddlers would also like to cool off, they can: this Peppa Pig boat playset floats for real, so they can enjoy hours of splashing fun with this water toy.
LEGO DUPLO Peppa Pig toys for kids are designed to support preschool learning and help toddlers to think logically and creatively as they construct a story sequence and imitate scenes from the TV show.
en-us.description: Today Peppa and Grandpa Pig are going on an adventure on his boat. Preschoolers’ imaginations set sail as they role-play a fun day at the coast. They build a sandcastle with the bucket and shovel, go looking for shells and help Peppa put on her flippers when it’s time for a dip. Toddlers can also enjoy water play as Grandpa Pig’s boat floats for real!
features: Imaginations set sail!
Toddlers practice observation and imitation skills as they role-play Peppa and Grandpa Pig sailing to the beach.
Dive into skill-building playtimes
Boat toy inspired by the show is designed to help preschoolers understand feelings as they imagine the characters’ emotions.
LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig Boat Trip
Catch a ride with Grandpa Pig
Take the helm and steer the boat to the beach.
Open the cabin door
Unload Peppa’s beach kit from Grandpa’s boat.
Learn to be safe in the sun
Peppa applies sunscreen under the parasol.
Cute toy accessories
Help Peppa put on her flippers.
Beach activities
Peppa builds sandcastles and collects shells.
Includes 2 Pig favorites
Comes with Peppa Pig and Grandpa Pig.
Gift for toddlers
This LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig toy makes a great best behavior reward for preschoolers aged 2+.
en-us.headline: LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig role-play toy for preschool kids
en-us.one_liner: This LEGO® DUPLO® Peppa Pig role-play toy for preschool kids helps develop toddlers’ fine motor skills, self-expression and creative storytelling.
en-us.title: Peppa Pig Boat Trip

en-us.bullet_points: •  Indulge a Minecraft™ player’s passion for the game with LEGO® Minecraft The Pig House (21170). All the fun, creativity and adventure of Minecraft with added hands-on, LEGO brick versatility.•  Authentic LEGO® Minecraft™ building playset featuring popular gaming character Alex, an iconic Creeper™, 2 pigs, accessories for Alex and carrots for the pigs.•  Kids use Minecraft™ skills to build a pig-shaped house, open the side and remove the roof to explore hidden rooms, hide from the Creeper™, care for pigs – and detonate a house-collapsing explosion!•  For ages 8 and up. The perfect gift for kids wanting to take their Minecraft™ play to the next level.•  Measuring over 5.5 in. (14 cm) high, 8 in. (20 cm) wide and 7.5 in. (19 cm) deep, the set encourages hands-on creativity and looks amazing on display in any Minecraft™ fan’s room.•  This LEGO® Minecraft™ set is made to last, endlessly reconfigurable, and easy to combine with other LEGO Minecraft sets.•  The extensive range of LEGO® Minecraft™ playsets bring the online Minecraft game to life with characters, scenes and features recreated with an imaginative mix of long-lasting LEGO bricks.•  LEGO® components fulfil rigorous industry quality standards to ensure they are consistent, compatible and connect and pull apart perfectly every time – and it’s been that way since 1958.•  LEGO® components are dropped, heated, crushed, twisted and analyzed to ensure they satisfy strict global safety standards.
en-us.comm_bullet_points: •  Indulge a Minecraft™ player’s passion for the game with LEGO® Minecraft The Pig House (21170). All the fun, creativity and adventure of Minecraft with added hands-on, LEGO brick versatility.•  Authentic LEGO® Minecraft™ building playset featuring popular gaming character Alex, an iconic Creeper™, 2 pigs, accessories for Alex and carrots for the pigs.•  Kids use Minecraft™ skills to build a pig-shaped house, open the side and remove the roof to explore hidden rooms, hide from the Creeper™, care for pigs – and detonate a house-collapsing explosion!•  For ages 8 and up. The perfect gift for kids wanting to take their Minecraft™ play to the next level.•  Measuring over 5.5 in. (14 cm) high, 8 in. (20 cm) wide and 7.5 in. (19 cm) deep, the set encourages hands-on creativity and looks amazing on display in any Minecraft™ fan’s room.
en-us.comm_description: Take a Minecraft™ player’s passion for their favorite online game to the next level with LEGO® Minecraft The Pig House (21170). This authentic Minecraft playset has all the fun, creativity and adventure of the online game – plus the physicality and versatility of LEGO building toys.Looking for the perfect Minecraft gift?Kids use their Minecraft skills to build the kind of wacky creation they create in the online game: a house shaped like a giant pig. The side of the structure opens to reveals a large room and a lift-off roof uncovers more room to play. The model is endlessly reconfigurable – and the entire head-room detaches to fit elsewhere on the model. Alex, the game’s heroic daredevil, is here to share the fun, while an iconic Creeper™ is determined to ambush the players. There’s activity outside too, with 2 cute pigs to care for. And, for added Minecraft authenticity, there’s an explosion function that blasts the toy to pieces!
en-us.description: Use your Minecraft™ skills to build a house shaped like a giant pig! There’s a side that opens to reveal a large room and a lift-off roof that uncovers a smaller room in the pig’s head. Explore inside with Alex – but watch out for the Creeper™. Fancy a redesign? Move the head-room somewhere else. Want a complete redesign? Use the explosion function to blast you model to pieces!
features: Minecraft™ creativity in the pig-shaped house
Put real-world adventures into Minecraft ™ players’ hands with this 490-piece, LEGO® brick adventure playset.
The Pig House is perfect for play and display
Kids can build the same unique creations they do in the online game – a giant pig house packed with cool features.
More fun inside the Pig House
Open the side to reveal authentic Minecraft™ features.
A secret room to discover
A lift-off roof uncovers a hidden library to explore.
Includes iconic characters
Alex, Creeper™ and 2 pigs inspire imaginative role play.
Authentic accessories
Lots of fun extras to kick-start creative stories.
Endlessly reconfigurable
The entire head-room detaches to fit elsewhere on the model.
Explosive fun!
When it’s time for a rebuild, use an explosion function.
Take Minecraft™ adventures to the next level
Combine this set with others from the LEGO® Minecraft™ range to expand kids’ imaginative play possibilities even further.

en-us.bullet_points:
• LEGO® brick Pig features rotatable head and eyes and movable ears, arms and legs, plus a podium with red flower and leaf elements.
• Also includes an embossed money envelope with traditional gold-colored print.
• Write your own personal message in the to/from label printed on the resealable box.
• The perfect Lunar New Year gift for children and LEGO® fans.
• Add a new tradition by giving the gift of play.
• Stands over 3” (10cm) tall.

en-us.bullet_points: •  More awesome characters! Collect and reminisce or boost endless play with these cool LEGO® Minifigures Looney Tunes™ (71030) toy bags. A fun treat for kids and fans of any age.•  What’s in the bag? 1 of 12 unique, buildable characters to discover, plus 1 or more accessories. A perfect addition to any LEGO® collection to inspire new play.•  LEGO® Minifigures characters will appeal to any boy or girl aged 5 and up, sparking their imagination and helping them develop creativity and confidence through individual play or with friends.•  These limited-edition, high-quality minifigure toys and accessories make an awesome extra gift or ‘just because’ treat that can add a little extra action to any currently owned set.•  LEGO® components meet stringent industry standards to ensure they are consistent, compatible and connect and pull apart consistently every time – it’s been that way since 1958.•  LEGO® components are dropped, squashed, twisted, heated, bent, scratched and stretched to make sure they meet stringent global safety standards.

A fun treat for kids and fans of any age.•  What’s in the bag? 1 of 12 unique, buildable characters to discover, plus 1 or more accessories. A perfect addition to any LEGO® collection to inspire new play.•  LEGO® Minifigures characters will appeal to any boy or girl aged 5 and up, sparking their imagination and helping them develop creativity and confidence through individual play or with friends.•  These limited-edition, high-quality minifigure toys and accessories make an awesome extra gift or ‘just because’ treat that can add a little extra action to any currently owned set.•  LEGO® components meet stringent industry standards to ensure they are consistent, compatible and connect and pull apart consistently every time – it’s been that way since 1958.
en-us.comm_description: Wacky action and fond memories await kids and cartoon fans in every bag! Each LEGO® Minifigures Looney Tunes™ (71030) collectible ‘mystery’ bag contains 1 of 12 cool, limited-edition character toys from the original Looney Tunes cartoon series.Awesome character toy lineupCartoon lovers young and old can collect, display or add some awesome character figures from the original Looney Tunes™ series into their current sets, including Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Tweety Bird, Sylvester, Road Runner, Wile E. Coyote, Porky Pig, Petunia Pig, Speedy Gonzales, Tasmanian Devil and Marvin the Martian.Collectible toysEach of the finely crafted, highly detailed LEGO minifigures comes in a sealed ‘mystery’ bag with 1 or more accessory elements to add to the action and fun, plus a collector’s overview leaflet. Makes a great little gift that will put a smile on anyone’s face.
en-us.description: Reminisce with some of your favorite Looney Tunes™ characters in this LEGO® Minifigures series! Hang out with Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Tweety Bird, Sylvester, Road Runner, Wile E. Coyote, Porky Pig, Petunia Pig, Speedy Gonzales, Tasmanian Devil or Marvin the Martian. Each detailed, limited-edition minifigure comes with one or more accessories. Who will be inside your next ‘mystery’ bag?
features: For the first time – 12 fun cartoon characters
Enchanting, limited-edition Looney Tunes™ cartoon characters, each in a mystery bag, in a first-time LEGO® Minifigures series.
12 unique characters to collect
Kids and fans of Looney Tunes™ cartoons get a lineup of nostalgic characters never seen before in a LEGO® Minifigure series.
What’s up, duck?
Bugs Bunny and Daffy Duck have a love-hate relationship.
The chase never ends
The Roadrunner outruns Wile E. Coyote every time.
Sufferin’ succotash!
Sylvester keeps dreaming of catching the adorable Tweety.
As fast as can be
Speedy Gonzales and the Tasmanian Devil run a close race.
The villain and a fierce bunny
Lola Bunny has a thing or two to show Marvin the Martian.
Th-th-th-that’s all, folks!
Porky and Petunia Pig are ready to close out the show.
A range of nostalgic minifigures for more fun
Collect to display or add to existing LEGO® sets for cool new stories. What’s in the bag is the perfect surprise treat.
en-us.headline: Appeal to cartoon fans with collectible minifigures!
en-us.one_liner: Indulge a Looney Tunes™ fan’s nostalgia with these awesome character toys! Each ‘mystery’ bag contains a minifigure with 1 or more accessories.
en-us.title: Looney Tunes™

locale.en-us.description: Coyote, Porky Pig, Petunia Pig, Speedy Gonzales, Tasmanian Devil or Marvin the Martian.
